ProjectTitle: Zeolite synthesis in a milli-fluidic ultrasonic flow reactor
InitialFeedbackHistory:
20/04/2023
Please note that, although FWO expects data to be preserved for 5 years, the KU Leuven RDM policy asks for 10 years of data preservation: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
Have you considered specific repositories already to share data? You can find some suggestions on the RDM website: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
